entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 07:39 AM MDT Thursday 16 March 2023
